name: Money Earner Simulator
description: Click the green flag to turn the game on. Spam click the coin for money. There are 5 levels, so when you finish the 5th, you win! More levels are coming soon. (Including one which gives $1000 per click!!! The higher level you get, the more money you earn. You always start with a free $1. Plus there are bonuses. You get $10 on your first bonus, $100 on your second, and more as you get higher levels. This game took me a few hours. I had to play this game so many times to check if it worked or not. But finally, it worked and I am super happy!!! Also when you click the green flag it resets your money so be careful. That's all I got to say! Bye!!!
